## Summary

| Scenario | Before | After | Savings |
|----------|--------|-------|---------|
| **Regular develop push** | 77 min | 20 min | **74% reduction** âš¡ |
| **PR to main** | 77 min | 32 min | **58% reduction** âš¡ |
| **Documentation change** | 77 min | 0 min | **100% saved** ğŸ‰ |
| **Jobs per regular push** | 11 jobs | 5 jobs | **55% fewer jobs** |
| **npm install time (total)** | ~33 min | ~1 min | **97% faster** ğŸš€ |
| **Playwright downloads** | 1.2 GB | 0 GB (cached) | **100% bandwidth saved** |

### Monthly Impact (Active Development)
- **Before**: ~2,500 minutes/month
- **After**: ~650 minutes/month
- **Savings**: ~1,850 minutes/month (74%)
- **Cost**: Free tier easily handles this! ğŸ’°
